person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Fall of wickets : 1-59 2-70 3-78 4-90 5-160 .

Let's think step by step.

1. In the given paragraph, there are no explicit mentions of persons. The paragraph only mentions the fall of wickets along with their corresponding scores.
2. However, in cricket, wickets represent the dismissal of a batsman. So, the entities in this paragraph can be identified as the batsmen who got dismissed at different points in the game.
3. Therefore, the "Person" entities in the paragraph are the batsmen who got dismissed at the following scores: 1) 59, 2) 70, 3) 78, 4) 90, and 5) 160.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

The relevant entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to Persons are:

1. The batsmen who got dismissed at the following scores: 1) [Person who got out at 59], 2) [Person who got out at 70], 3) [Person who got out at 78], 4) [Person who got out at 90], and 5) [Person who got out at 160].

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

|--------|

| [Person who got out at 70] |
| [Person who got out at 78] |
